channel.title: Looking for Epic Monument for sannin run
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Looking for Epic Monument for sannin run" - Looking to briefly join village for Sannin run.

item.title: Looking for Epic Monument for sannin run
item.content:encoded: Hi, I'm planning a Sannin attempt next week (just in time for the 21 day bonus and topweb bonus) and am looking for a village to join briefly for use of epic monument, and for picking up snakeman in transition. I have some major and minor village contracts I can use when I'm in this village.
